description:
Designer & management software for xTool laser cutters & engravers.


1. Incremental Updates: Added support for faster incremental software updates.
2. AImake Agent (New): Generate designs for engraving and printing from natural language prompts.
3. Improved Shape Masks: You can now easily create masks from preset shapes or any path on the canvas.
4. Enhanced Image Trace: Improved path accuracy to reduce overlaps and added a new fill preview.
5. Smarter Nesting: Items that don't fit on the material will now be automatically placed outside the workspace.
6. Upgraded Material Test Array:
  - Now suggests parameter ranges based on your material.
  - Added one-click reuse for saved test history.
7. Device Connection Troubleshooter: Added a new intelligent troubleshooter to help resolve connection issues.
8. Updated Safety Training: The safety tutorial is now more concise and required for new users. (Completed users are not affected.)
9. Custom Default Mode: You can now set a default processing mode for your device.
Device-Specific Updates:
1. P3:
  - Quickly switch from Auto to Manual mode during a job.
  - Batch Fill is now supported in lifting plane mode.
  - Manually select focus points if the close-up snapshot fails.
  - Added a "Non-Reflective Material" option to improve nesting success.
2. MetalFab:
  - Smart Parameter Suggestions: Automatically recommends air pressure and focal length based on your selected gas, nozzle, and material.
  - New Processing Order: Added a new "By Layer, From Center Out" processing sequence.
  - Manual Camera Control: Added manual camera adjustments for high-contrast lighting conditions.
  - Clamp Collision Avoidance: The software now automatically detects clamp areas to prevent head collisions.
3. RA3:
  - New Cylindrical Correction: Instantly correct image distortion on cylindrical or conical objects (like tumblers) to prevent stretching and compression.
4. AP2 Max:
  - Quieter & More Efficient: Optimized fan speeds for different filters to reduce noise and extend filter life.
